description: Carrot is wonderfully paired with poppyseed in this simple salad. It will keep in the fridge for 2-3 days so is great for having on hand to add to your lunchbox.
steps: Put all of the ingredients in a bowl, season with salt and pepper and mix well.
tips: If time is limited, use a food processor to grate the carrots.
title: Carrot and poppyseed salad
